				... Read moreDetailed Hello Mentor Employee ReviewsLikes: Nothing. Guys this company is a scam. I joined the company at a package of around 4 lpa as a senior canceller. My experience was terrible. Mad to work on Sundays too. No holidays at all. The team leads are just good for nothing people who only know to micromanage and hang out behind girls of the company. Dislikes: Ceos are an utter waste, look like scamsters themselves. Just rich background and so are spending money on this startup. 
When it comes to employees , mostly all are freshers, taken at a low salary like 16-18k . 
Made to work all days a week. Imagine working on a Sunday . I wouldnt want even my enemy to. Company culture holds the highest rating at 2.3, while job security is rated the lowest amongst all factors at 1.2. 

Does Hello Mentor pay their employees well?According to AmbitionBox reviews, Hello Mentor employees rate their salary and benefits at 2.1 out of 5, based on 8 reviews. This lower rating reflects a significant level of dissatisfaction among employees regarding compensation and benefits, suggesting that many may feel undercompensated. You can know more about Hello Mentor salaries 
								
								   here
								 .How is the work culture at Hello Mentor?Work culture at Hello Mentor is rated 2.3 out of 5 by 8 employees on AmbitionBox, indicating a below-average environment. Work culture encompasses aspects like collaboration, support, and overall employee satisfaction. This lower rating suggests that employees may experience challenges in aspects like collaboration, support, and overall satisfaction. How is the job security at Hello Mentor?Based on 8 reviews on AmbitionBox, Hello Mentor employees rate job security at 1.2 out of 5. This lower rating indicates that a significant number of employees may have concerns about their job stability and the reliability of their roles at Hello Mentor. How do I get a job at Hello Mentor?To get a job at Hello Mentor, start by browsing the current open positions 
						  here
						 and apply for roles that align with your skills and interests. It’s crucial to tailor your resume and cover letter to highlight relevant experience.
